examples: There are those who will dispute this statement, but the fact of the matter is that swarminess is an inherited character and young queens produced by a swarmy colony will, most probably, also head swarmy colonies.

entries.meaning: Swarming with people or activity; teeming.
examples: This market is the noisiest and swarmiest centre of noisy and swarming Florence, and I always like to pass through it on that account.
